MOD_KA_OFFLINE_PROGRESS: You completed ${amount} excavations while you were offline!
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_SHOVEL: A shovel used for digging up artifacts.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_SKILLCAPE: -10% digsite excavation time, +100% GP from Archaeology, and increases chance of finding artifacts.
MOD_KA_CHALLENGE_TEXT: To the landlubber who finds this, here be ye challenge:
MOD_KA_CHALLENGE_ERROR: You lack the requirements to complete this challenge.
MOD_KA_VOLCANIC_HEADER: Click the lock when the indicator is in the red zone.
MOD_KA_ROYAL_RIDDLE_HEADER: To unlock the chest, riddle me this:
MOD_KA_ROYAL_RIDDLE_0: How many [melvorD:Carrot] do I need to cook {mod*3} [melvorD:Carrot_Cake]?
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_VOLCANIC_1: Fossilized tree resin containing a prehistoric reptile.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_VOLCANIC_2: Bones from a large prehistoric creature.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_VOLCANIC_3: A large speckled egg from a prehistoric creature.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_VOLCANIC_4: Extrusive igneous rock formed from lava cooling rapidly.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_VOLCANIC_5: A rare opal formed from volcanic rock.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_CASTLE_1: A golden chalice used in religious ceremonies.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_CASTLE_2: A crown worn by a monarch of the past.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_CASTLE_3: A vibrant pointed hat adorned with bells.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_CASTLE_4: An azure shield painted with two white chevrons.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_CASTLE_5: A sword with a jeweled hilt and pommel.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_PIRATE_2: A skull-adorned cutlass prized by a pirate captain.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_PIRATE_3: A bronze coin with a skull and crossbones on one side.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_PIRATE_4: A barnacled bottle of vintage rum.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_PIRATE_5: An empire-branded tin of exotic spices.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_BARROWS_1: A sturdy iron-head axe with a leather-wrapped ashwood handle.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_BARROWS_2: An iron-domed helmet with a pair of ox horns affixed to the top.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_BARROWS_3: A gold-tipped cattle horn with a leather strap.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_BARROWS_4: A chunk of granite with a runic symbol carved into it.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_ARTIFACT_BARROWS_5: A round oak shield with an iron boss and rim.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_DESERT: An ornate brass lamp that feels warm to the touch.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_DESERT_USE_DESC: Choose a skill to enhance, granting a level or 200k experience (whichever is lowest). The lamp will crumble to ash after use.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_JUNGLE: An ancient wooden box sealed with a complex locking mechanism.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_JUNGLE_USE_DESC: Arrange the sliding pieces of the puzzle box to retrieve the treasure within.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_VOLCANIC: This chest seethes with volcanic heat.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_VOLCANIC_USE_DESC: Hot to the touch, the lock requires swift and skillful hands to open.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_CASTLE: An ornate wooden box sealed with a complex locking mechanism.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_CASTLE_USE_DESC: Figure out the correct combination to unlock the royal treasury box.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_PIRATE: There appears to be a challenge inside.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_PIRATE_USE_DESC: Open the bottle to read and complete the challenge.
MOD_KA_ITEM_DESC_CURIOSITY_BARROWS: An ancient chest locked by a strange mechanism consisting of multiple wheels.
MOD_KA_ITEM_CURIOSITY_BARROWS_USE_DESC: Align the wheels correctly to unlock the chest and claim the treasure within.
